alert.note: Alert for Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 8:33AM CDT until May 03 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Roseau River at Roseau affecting Roseau County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roseau River at Roseau. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
